channel.title: EarthCube Software Citation
channel.description: Recent content on EarthCube Software Citation

item.title: Overview
item.description: EARTHCUBE SOFTWARE CITATION As the EarthCube program winds down, these software citation recommendations are intended to provide guidance for current EC-funded software development projects on how to ensure persistent identification, citability, and discoverability for EarthCube-funded software. These recommendations also provide templates and strategies for subsequent software development projects going forward.
